Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Descriptions: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>58.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>66.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>75%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>83.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>91.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors Strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Cons.Name: Glacial Omen
Cons.Effect: Upon hitting an enemy with a Swift Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 3. Upon hitting an enemy with a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 6. For each <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> consumed, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

Cons.Name: Arctic Ocean Predator
Cons.Effect: The 3rd hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color> can be directly followed up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</color>. For each point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.

Cons.Name: Endless Hoarfrost
Cons.Effect: Whenever a squad member <color=#98EFF0>Freezes</color> or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> and the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect. She also recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.

Cons.Name: The Feast Begins
Cons.Effect: When Ellen uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or gains <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color>, her PEN Ratio increases by 20% for 6s. She also gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. With 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, using a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color> consumes all stacks, increasing the DMG of the current attack by 250%.
